title: Cotic mullet the Jeht, RocketMAX and FlareMAX 29ers w/ Works Components angle set
content:
British steel mountain bike manufacturer, Cotic, is now offering the 140mm travel Jeht, 125mm travel FlareMAX and 160mm travel RocketMAX 29ers in the mullet configuration. The frames remain identical; the only change is the replacement of the 29″ rear wheel with a 27.5″, and the addition of a 1° head angle set from Works Components

The post Cotic mullet the Jeht, RocketMAX and FlareMAX 29ers w/ Works Components angle set appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Jessie-May Morgan
